mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monthly_card (card_id, card_no, vehicle_id, issue_time, validity_period, renew_time, status, admin_id) VALUES (#{cardId}, #{cardNo}, #{vehicleId}, #{issueTime}, #{validityPeriod}, #{renewTime}, #{status}, #{adminId})
